column1: English Sent: The Himalayan uplift out of the Tethys sea and subsidence of the northern flank of the peninsular plateau resulted in the formation of a large basin.
Hindi Tansl: 'teWisa' ke himAlaya ke rUpa meM Upara uTane waWA prAyaxvIpIya_paTAra ke uwwarI kinAre ke nIce Xazsane ke pariNAmasvarUpa eka bahuwa badZI xroNI kA nirmANa huA.
Anu Translation:  prAyaxvIpIya paTAra ke uwwarI pArSva ke tethys samuxra ke bAhara Ora XazsAv himAlaya_kA uTAna aXika jalakuNda ke suvyavasWiwa krama meM pariNAma nikalI
